strings.schematron.title: ISO Validation Rules
strings.M6: CharacterString must have content or its parent must have a valid nilReason attribute.
strings.M8: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row24] - A name is required for contact
strings.M13: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row10] - Content mandatory for dataset or series
strings.M15: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row12] - Process step required if no statement or source
strings.M16: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row08] - Dataset must have report or lineage
strings.M17: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row09] - LevelDescription needed unless dataset or series
strings.M22: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row05] - Dataset or series must have a topic category
strings.M23: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row06] - Either aggregateDataSetName or aggregateDataSetIdentifier must be documented
strings.M30: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row15] - Check point description required if available
strings.M61: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1] - HierarchyLevelName must be documented if hierarchyLevel does not contain "dataset"

alert.M6.div: Topic category is mandatory if MD_Metadata.hierarchyLevel equal 'dataset' or 'series' or doesn't exist.

alert.M6.characterString.div: CharacterString must have content or parent's nilReason attribute must be legitimate.

alert.M6.directPosition.div: The presence of a dimension attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.

alert.M7.axisAndSrs.div: The presence of an axisLabels attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.

alert.M7.uomAndSrs.div: The presence of an uomLabels attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.

alert.M7.uomAndAxis.div: The presence of an uomLabels attribute implies the presence of the axisLabels attribute and vice versa.

alert.M8.div: You must specify one or more of individualName, organisationName or positionName. Suggestions: Check contact information for metadata contact or cited responsable party in identification section for example.

strings.report.M8: One or more of individualName, organisationName or positionName found in contact:

alert.M9.access.div:
Other constraints should be defined if access constraints is set to "Other restrictions".
otherConstraints: documented if accessConstraints = 'otherRestrictions'.
Suggestions: Add an other constraints element and explain the reason.

alert.M9.use.div:
Other constraints should be defined if use constraints is set to "Other restrictions".
otherConstraints: documented if useConstraints = 'otherRestrictions'.
Suggestions: Add an other constraints element and explain the reason.

alert.M9.div: 'units' is mandatory if 'maxValue' or 'minValue' are provided.

alert.M11.div: 'description' is mandatory if 'sourceExtent' is not documented. Suggestions: Add a description or/and a source extent.

report.M11.div: Description and sourceExtent are documented for lineage.

alert.M13.div:
Statement is mandatory if no source or process step defined for dataset or a serie.
If(count(source) + count(processStep) =0) and (DQ_DataQuality.scope.level = 'dataset' or 'series') then statement is mandatory.

alert.M14.div:
'source' role is mandatory if LI_Lineage.statement and 'processStep' role are not documented.
Suggestions: Define lineage statement or process step role.

strings.report.M14: Source required if no statement or processStep.

alert.M15.div:
'processStep' role is mandatory if LI_Lineage.statement and 'source' role are not documented.
Suggestions: Define lineage statement or source role.

strings.report.M15: Process step required if no statement or source.

alert.M16.div: 'report' or 'lineage' role is mandatory if scope.DQ_Scope.level = 'dataset'.

alert.M19.div:
One distributor format is needed.
count (distributionFormat + distributor/MD_Distributor/distributorFormat) > 0.

alert.M20.div:
In extent section, one of the following elements need to be defined : description, geographicElement, temporalElement, verticalElement.
count(description + geographicElement + temporalElement + verticalElement) > 0.

strings.report.M20: One description, geographicElement, temporalElement, verticalElement found.

alert.M21.div:
For a dataset, an extent has to be defined.
MD_Metadata.hierarchyLevel = 'dataset' (i.e. the default value of this property on the parent) implies count (extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicBoundingBox) + count (extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicDescription) >=1.

alert.M26.obligation.div: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'obligation' is mandatory.

alert.M26.maximumOccurence.div: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'maximumOccurence' is mandatory.

alert.M26.domainValue.div: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'domainValue' is mandatory.

strings.report.M28: Domain code documented for code list element.

alert.M29.div: if 'dataType' not equal to 'codelistElement' then 'shortName' is mandatory.

strings.report.M29: Short name documented for none code list element.

alert.M61.div: hierarchyLevelName must be documented if hierarchyLevel does not contain 'dataset'

strings.alert.requiredTitle: Data Identification Citation Title is a required element
strings.alert.requiredDate: Data Identification Citation Date is a required element
strings.alert.requiredDateType: Data Identification Citation DateType is a required element
strings.report.requiredDateType: Data Identification Citation DateType is found

strings.alert.requiredCitation: Data Identification Citation is a required element
